remarks: A member of the span of the singleton of a vector is a member of a subspace containing the vector.  ( ~ elspansn3 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-2014.)
statement:
lspsnss.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lspsnss.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspsnel3.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lspsnel3.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.
lspsnel3.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. U ) $.
lspsnel3.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( N ` { X } ) ) $.
lspsnel3 $p |- ( ph -> Y e. U ) $.
